    • Uses of IWorkItemType in com.ibm.team.workitem.common

      Methods in com.ibm.team.workitem.common that return IWorkItemType 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IWorkItemType IWorkItemCommon.findCachedWorkItemType(IProjectAreaHandle projectArea, java.lang.String identifier) 
      IWorkItemType IWorkItemCommon.findWorkItemType(IProjectAreaHandle projectArea, java.lang.String identifier, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
      Returns the work item type with the given identifier, if available in the given project area Configuration or in the static Configuration in work item common plugin or null if no type with this identifier is configured in the process configuration or in static configuration.
      IWorkItemType IWorkItemCommon.findWorkItemType2(IProjectAreaHandle projectArea, java.lang.String identifier, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
      Returns the work item type with the given identifier in the given project area or null if no type with this identifier is configured in the process configuration.
      IWorkItemType IWorkItemCommon.findWorkItemTypeByTypeCategory(IProjectAreaHandle projectArea, java.lang.String identifier, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
      Returns the work item type with the given category id in the given project area.

      Methods in com.ibm.team.workitem.common with parameters of type IWorkItemType 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IWorkItemCommon.changeWorkItemType(IWorkItem workItem, IWorkItemType type, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
      Deprecated. 
      use IWorkItemCommon.updateWorkItemType(IWorkItem, IWorkItemType, IWorkItemType, IProgressMonitor) instead
      boolean IWorkItemCommon.updateWorkItemType(IWorkItem workItem, IWorkItemType newType, IWorkItemType oldType, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
      Change the given work item to have the given type, custom attributes of the new type will be added and initialized to their default value iff the work item does not have them already.
